Package de.uzk.hki.da.metadata

Classes dealing with conversion and IO of various metadata formats.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EDMGenerator
    The Interface EDMGenerator.
    XmlReader
    Interface for classes that deserialize preservation metadata encoded in different XML formats.
    XmlWriter
    Interface for classes that serialize preservation metadata given as java objects into different formats.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MetsRightsSectionXmlReader
    Converts a rights section which is embedded into a METS file to the native data model.
    MetsURNXmlReader
    The Class MetsURNXmlReader.
    PremisXmlJhoveExtractor
    Accepts a premis.xml file and creates a new xml file for each jhove section
    PremisXmlReader
    Translates contents of a PREMIS file to the native object model used by the ContentBroker.
    PremisXmlReaderNodeFactory
    This custom NodeFactory is used to ignore jhove data when parsing a premis.xml file
    PremisXmlValidator
    The Class PremisXmlValidator.
    PremisXmlValidator.PremisResourceResolver
    The Class PremisResourceResolver.
    PremisXmlWriter
    Maps an object of our own native data model format to a premis file.
    RdfToJsonLdConverter
    The Class RdfToJsonLdConverter.
    RightsContainer
    Acts as a container for preservation metadata.
    XepicurWriter
    Generates a minimal xepicur XML file for URN publishing
    XmpCollector
    The Class XmpCollector.
    XsltGenerator
    The Class XsltGenerator.
